properties.areaDesc: Guadalupe Mountains Above 7000 Feet; Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 5 at 8:09AM CST until February 5 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Midland/Odessa TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains in Texas.

* WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold
wind chills as low as 10 below zero could result in hypothermia
if precautions are not taken.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452-
9292.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...BLIZZARD WARNING IS CANCELLED
